[File Input and Output]

Detailed Description

Base class for all scene file exporters.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzExporter::DzExporter ( const QString &  extension  ) 

Constructor. Creates a new exporter. This is usually only called by the constructors of child classes to set the extension they support.

Parameters:
extension The file extension (type) that this exporter saves to (excluding the preceeding '.').
DzExporter::~DzExporter (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

QString DzExporter::getDescription (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
A description of the exporter that can be placed in a file type selection combo box (e.g. "Acclaim Skeleton")
QString DzExporter::getExtension (  )  const [inline, slot]
Returns:
The extension that this exporter will force filenames to (excluding the preceeding '.').
bool DzExporter::isFileExporter (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
true if this exporter writes to a 'real' file. Derived classes should override this to indicate whether or not they are writing out to a real file. Exporters can, if they want to, write to entities other than files (e.g. sockets, pipes, etc.)
DzError DzExporter::writeFile ( const QString &  filename,
const DzFileIOSettings *  options 
) [slot]

Exports to a file.

Parameters:
filename Name of the file to export to.
options The options for the exporter.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, or an error code if the export failed.
